website_summaries.verdict: A well built, sturdy toothbrush holder. Just choose your spot carefully before you mount it.
pros: Easy to slip toothbrushes in and out
cons: Difficult to remove without damaging your wall

customer_reviews.title: Great product once you change up mounting strips
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Very sturdy. The main issue is with the adhesive strips on the back. Once you tape this to a surface, you won't be getting it off. Use a dry washcloth and rub the adhesive strips off, clean the surface with rubbing alcohol, then apply 3M Velcro strips so you can remove it for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to remove. You will definitely end up damaging your wall.
customer_reviews.text: This is impossible to remove from the wall without literally cutting out the wall around it. Even if you somehow manage to remove it, I can't imagine you would be able to avoid damaging your wall.
customer_reviews.author: J. Emberton

customer_reviews.title: Great design but installation method needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: Pros - love the design, made of seemingly good quality metal Cons - included installation method is not ideal Bought two these to help organize our tiny bathroom. The design is great. But reviews were not good regarding the included mounting tape. So I skipped using the adhesive tape that comes on the back of them which would have made washing them difficult anyway. Instead, I used 3 pairs of neodymium magnets, one screwed to the back of a shelf unit and one inside the stainless steel holder, to hold them in place. I added a few extra small screw underneath to make sure they don’t slip down.
customer_reviews.author: Suzan

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, holds up well.
customer_reviews.text: Got two of these, one for the shower since sometimes we brush our teeth there and then the other for our sink. Love the fact that it saves on counter space. Easy install, just peel the sticker and smoosh it on the wall or wherever. Haven't had any problems with it fitting tooth brushes of different sizes, it also holds razor blades. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Organize your toothbrushes!
customer_reviews.text: These work great for small spaces or if you don't have enough counter space! I put these on the inside of my cabinets and mounted some to a board that hide an anchor into a wall. You can also just glue the board to the wall if you don't like to use anchors.
customer_reviews.author: Dre

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my razor and my toothbrush. Only downside is that once it’s on the wall you may damage the paint when you pull it off. Consider using non damaging strips instead
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Already rusting
customer_reviews.text: Have been using it for 3 months and already it is showing rust spots. Also wish they would us command strips instead for easy removal.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: It keeps things off the counter. Great if you need to free up space. Wish I had read the comments about damage to the walls when removing holder. I would have used Command Strips.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Attached it to the inside of medicine cabinet door for out of sight storage! Husband and I are so glad we bought this holder
customer_reviews.author: Rachel L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I installed it right away with no issues, just peel and stick. I wish the bottom lip was at an incline so that the water wouldn't puddle there and just drip off.
customer_reviews.author: Kenn

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase!! Sturdy and convenient put it in the shower to hold toothbrush and razor.
customer_reviews.author: tim foote

customer_reviews.title: Great Item! Looks Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: It works great! The adhesive backing was applied once and not moved and has held for nearly a year. Looks very nice and high quality on the wall! Serves its purpose perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Brody K.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up and feel like it is hardware holding it on! Great! And sleek
customer_reviews.author: FrankBritt

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, works well
customer_reviews.text: A slick and modern look, keeps things off the sink and counters. I'm interested to see if the adhesive can withstand being reused, or if I can reapply the adhesive in case I decide to move it around.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Toothbrush and Razor
customer_reviews.text: Kind of an interesting gismo and is stable on a shelf. I use it pretty much as shown. This also keeps the toothbrush from hitting the holder.
customer_reviews.author: W. Pantos

customer_reviews.title: I love this toothbrush holder
customer_reviews.text: Very sleek and looks great. It matches well with my bathroom. I have bought one in the last 3 places I’ve lived at. Gets dirty quick, but you should be cleaning it always anyways.
customer_reviews.author: C Brown

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, it keeps the toothbrushes dry and off of the counter
customer_reviews.author: MunchHunch

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It’s very minimal and does the job. It has great design and a good stick.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well and looks fine, I just wish it could hold a thicker toothbrush. Mine gets stuck
customer_reviews.author: DANGitsVictor

customer_reviews.title: Convenient!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install - still sticking after living in our place for 6 months
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Great, wish it was a little bigger.
customer_reviews.text: Nice modern looking holder, wish it had a few more slots. Easy install.
customer_reviews.author: A. C. Emerman

customer_reviews.title: I'll buy this again when I move!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Who wants their toothbrush sitting in a cup near the faucet, where it can/will get splattered on? (Ick!) Not me! With this, my toothbrush is safely up on the wall, away from potential nasties. Looks nice, too. Just make sure you place it carefully -- the adhesive is super strong!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Bratt

customer_reviews.title: artwork above the sink
customer_reviews.text: what an artful, fun way to stow the toothbrushes; love the shiny chrome
customer_reviews.author: nabuna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great in the shower. Up for a few months now, and no issues. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: HobbyHobberson

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, easy to install and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item previously for my old apartment. I had a hard time removing it so I bought a new one. Looks great, easy to install and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great modern look
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking product and quite practical. The only reason its a 4 star is because its edges are a little sharp, so have to be careful while cleaning it.
customer_reviews.author: Bezhash

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The finish is beautiful, it looks very sleek on the wall next to our sink.
customer_reviews.author: R. M

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, effective, susceptible to smudges, and hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: I like the simplicity in this design. It works perfectly for holding toothbrushes and razors and looks sleek and stylish in the process. The only reason I am not giving it a 5 star review is because it smudges so easily and is subsequently quite difficult to clean. If they made this thing out of the 'smudge proof' stainless steel that my refrigerator has and tilted the bottom piece just slightly so that water didn't pool/stand on it, it would be perfect. As it stands, have fun cleaning the inside with a q-tip...
customer_reviews.author: V91-Bleach

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Shower Toothbrushes/Razors
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if I was going to like this. But I do. It sticks right to my shower wall that is tiled. I've had it for over a month and it hasn't fallen off or slipped out of place. It's been fine to clean, not difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Tina S

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive not a good idea.
customer_reviews.text: After about 3 weeks of use the adhesive lost it's ability to stick and the item fell bending the edge of the platform of the holder. This calls to question if there was proper product testing of the adhesive. And FYI, the item was mounted on a dry tile. Should this item be considered defective since it did not adhere to the surface? Regardless I can't return it because it will cost more for me to send it back than to just keep it. I was so happy when I got it and put it up. It really was aesthetically pleasing and functional. Until it fell. What a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron S.

customer_reviews.title: Sleek Looking and Clutter Free
customer_reviews.text: This brush and razor holder has come in handy for myself and my fiance. We both keep our tooth brushes and razors in the shower and this was a perfect solution to keep them out of the way. The design is sleek and stylish. The installation was as simple as sticking it to the wall. Just make sure you clean the area, use rubbing alcohol, let dry, then press firmly. :)
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany from Metro STL

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfull
customer_reviews.text: This looks great in my shower. It has so many uses for things but I love that it keeps me from having to put my toothbrushes down on the counter. It is so nice looking and sticks wonderfully. I thought the stickiness would wear out from the water and humidity in the shower but it is like super glue. I just hope it doesn't mess up the wall if I ever have to remove it.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Jo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install on Tile, Working great for a year
customer_reviews.text: I like that it doesn't take constant attention to have this look clean. On tile, it was an easy installation, nothing extra required. 10 mionths later, it is holding up well. in hind sight, one more slot would be best. This works well. I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Southwest Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Sticks to the wall well, meaning the adhesive does its job! Holds the toothbrushes nicely.. Does everything it says it does! Definitely well worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Emery

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY! This is what I have been looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot tell you how happy I am to find something other than a cup to put our toothbrushes & razor in to keep them off the counter. We have not stuck it to the wall yet (we plan to repaint soon). Right now it is in-between the sink faucet and the wall. Sits great there and keeps things off the sides of the sink where they always used to sit.
customer_reviews.author: B Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and high style
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and high style. Everyone comments on how cool it is. Cleaning it is a little difficult, as it doesn't open. Brushed chrome, only. Wish it was available in polished. Happy to have bought it, though.
customer_reviews.author: J. F.

customer_reviews.title: Smart looking and work great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little gem. I don't like things on the counter, these are wonderful, small, smart looking and easy to apply. Just wipe the wall clean and dry and these work within seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Ladyface

customer_reviews.title: MISLEADING advertisement.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to hold our razors in the shower. Only fits small razors, doesn’t fit ours. Does not state that in ad. Seller will issue a refund only when you send it back on YOUR dime! Then you need pay extra for proof of delivery as well.
customer_reviews.author: Information_only

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Sucky glue strip.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. But the glue doesn't hold up. I had to supper glue it to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: MijnLiefde

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: helped clear counter clutter. i stuck it to my wall with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: ANGELA HARRIS

customer_reviews.title: Works great and looks good
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new toothbrush holder that is easy to clean and this works. The self-adhesive backing makes it easy to attach and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Wade Kinsey

customer_reviews.title: I just bought 2 of these items and both of ...
customer_reviews.text: I just bought 2 of these items and both of the 3M adhesive will not stick to any surface. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put up and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Took feedback from other reviews and used command strips (Velcro ones). Put it on my mirror (the picture makes it look like it’s floating lol) Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: This little thing is great. My boys brush their teeth in the shower
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is great. My boys brush their teeth in the shower, and this comes in very handy. Sticks great to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: L. George

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to install and keeps our toothbrushes safe, clean and out of the way. Great buy :)
customer_reviews.author: Earl & Jill Holyoak

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but falls down.
customer_reviews.text: Ok I love this. With that being said the thing would not stay on the wall! I wish there was an option to drill it in! I ended up with auto Velcro on the back. Easy to take down and clean now I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The bottom gets mold in it if you do t clean every time
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Miller

customer_reviews.title: Stand up
customer_reviews.text: Really impressive and substantial brush holders. Good heavy construction that will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: John Frantz

customer_reviews.title: practical
customer_reviews.text: love this item, put in medicine cabinet out of odors way.
customer_reviews.author: dale o

customer_reviews.title: Love this! No more disgusting water sitting at the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! No more disgusting water sitting at the bottom of a cup holder! perfect fix, though you do have to wipe the water a bit but overall excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Devonee Monique

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love this thing, it works fantastically for our small space.
customer_reviews.author: CMT

customer_reviews.title: Other than the fact that the 3M tape on its ...
customer_reviews.text: Other than the fact that the 3M tape on its backside will leave some residue on your mirror or wall, it does its job.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Note - very hard to clean and remove.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great room saver for the bathroom. Just sticks right on the wall!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's asked to do. Hasn't dropped a brush yet.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Toothpaste holder
customer_reviews.text: Finally a toothpaste holder that is easy to use and install. It is on the wall and very practical. Looks great too!
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!!! I just purchased two more!!! And my friend also bought one.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy R.

customer_reviews.title: This works PERFECTLY! My bathroom is small so storage ...
customer_reviews.text: This works PERFECTLY! My bathroom is small so storage and organization can be tricky. This helped keep my sink clean and clutter free, especially since we realized the toothpaste can slip behind the toothbrushes.
customer_reviews.author: A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Love this holder, works very well, stays on the wall and frees up space.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wish it held more toothbrushes, but overall I find it meets my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Galbraith

customer_reviews.title: feels very sturdy and provided adhesive is great as long as you ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured/described. Basic no frills toothbrush holder. Looks sleek, feels very sturdy and provided adhesive is great as long as you wipe down the wall first.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Silva

product_meta.title: Lingstar Toothbrush Holder Wall Mounted - Durable Stainless Steel Razor Holder with Self Adhesive
product_meta.description: Multi-purpose, keep your bathroom tidy and clean with this stainless steel toothbrush holder. Can hold toothbrushes and razor and any accessories
feature_bullets: Size: 5.5"(H) * 4.5"(W), adhesive tape back, easy to install without drilling
Made of 100% stainless steel, durable and waterproof, fine workmanship
Wall mounted without drilling or hurting wall.Installed with a Magic Sticker
Package included: 1 x Stainless steel toothbrush holder
Multi-purpose, keep your bathroom tidy and clean with this stainless steel toothbrush holder. Can hold toothbrushes and razor and any accessories
